title: Illithid Powers
content: d (X33, Y594) (Quest Find the Missing Shipment). One can be found in the Druid Grove (X445, Y-17), it would be on a table in Halsin's/Nettie's Secret Research Lab next to the Dissected Drow body. One can be found by defeating True Soul Gut (X297, Y-12). One can be found by defeating Minthara. One can be found by defeating Dror Ragzlin. One can be found by defeating True Soul Nere. If you side with the Absolute, you can get as many Illithid Powers as "Gift by the Absolute" as you missed by not ki
